prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon with a fiery mane and agile limbs for a fierce battle.
I want a Pokemon that embodies speed and fire, with bright orange fur and a dynamic pose.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a monkey, showcasing flames and intense energy.
Make a design featuring a bipedal creature with a playful personality and fiery attacks.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains, with vibrant colors and fierce eyes.
Show me an energetic Pokemon that can unleash powerful fire moves in combat.
Design a Pokemon with a striking appearance, blending agility and flame-themed features.
